page.title: 05Shopping Habits
page.content: In{Caerau}there are a few small {supermarkets.}There is the Spar,the Coop and a few corner shops. They are quite small. Some people go to Gateway and International in{Maesteg for it is cheaper and there is a wider choice of goods, however it is costly to go to Maesteg by bus. My mother usually walks down to Maesteg and walks back but if it is raining she catches the bus.Some people go to Maesteg to buy clothes. One of the clothes shops is called New Look. Most people go shopping on Thursday or Friday because they have their pay then. There is an{open air {market}in Maesteg every Friday where a wide range of goods is sold and people come from miles around.
